title.rendered: STEDI MITSUBISHI QE PAJERO SPORT HEADLIGHT PIGGY BACK ADAPTER

content.rendered:
Mitsubishi QE (2015-2019) Pajero Sport Driving Light Piggy Back High Beam Adapter

DETAILS

Specifically designed to suit the Mitsubishi Pajero Sport which is fitted with factory LED headlamps.

The easy solution for wiring up your Driving Lights with no need for splicing, trapping or soldering as it is a direct Plug & Play install.

Designed to work with all STEDI Quick Fit Wiring Harnesses.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

CONNECTOR TYPE 8 Pin
FITS MITSUBISHI: QE Pajero Sport 2015 – 2019

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x Mitsubishi QE Pajero Sport High beam Adapter

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI MITSUBISHI QE PAJERO SPORT HEADLIGHT PIGGY BACK ADAPTER

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
